page.title: 13LEISURE PURSUITS IN HARWICH
page.content: A SURVEY OF EVERY FORM CLASS IN THE FIRST YEAR WAS CARRIED OUT TO FIND OUT THE MOST POPULAR HOBBIES FOR BOYS AND GIRLS.THE FAVOURITE BY FAR WAS SWIMMING.THERE ARE ABOUT 280 CHILDREN IN THE FIRST YEAR AND SWIMMING GOT 167 VOTES. SWIMMING BECAME MORE POPULAR WHEN THE INDOOR SWIMMING POOL WAS OPENED LAST NOVEMBER.QUITE A LONG WAY BEHIND CAME FOOTBALL WITH 90 VOTES.LOTS OF BOYS PLAY IN LOCAL TEAMS SUCH AS HARWICH AND PARKESTON AND DOVERCOURT SPARTANS AS WELL AS THE SCHOOL ONE. A TEAM OF DUTCH SCHOOLBOYS ALSO COME OVER TO PLAY FOOTBALL AND TEAMS FROM THE SCHOOL VISIT HOLLAND. TENNIS WAS THE NEXT MOST POPULAR SPORT WITH 80 VOTES. FINALLY, MANY CHILDREN HAVE COLLECTIONS, WITH RUBBERS AND STAMPS BEING THE MOST POPULAR.
